rules_text:
Flying
When Hellkite Whelp enters the battlefield, search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
